markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs=""
>
[Stanching](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1294)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These symbols close bloody wounds. Armor with this rune reduces the DC of the flat check to end [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) from 15 to 12 (7 with particularly effective assistance).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Stanching
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

**Price** 130 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Stanching (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC of the flat check is reduced from 15 to 10 (5 with particularly effective assistance).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Standard"
>
Stanching (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC of the flat check is reduced from 15 to 8 (3 with particularly effective assistance).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Stanching (True)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

**Price** 12,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC of the flat check is reduced from 15 to 5 (particularly effective assistance automatically removes the persistent bleed damage).
name: Stanching
